# Anthropic

Integration with Anthropic Claude models for advanced language understanding and generation.

*Documentation for specific functions in this module will be automatically generated from the codebase.*

## Usage

```python
import pixeltable as pxt

# Access Anthropic functions
pxt.functions.anthropic.messages(...)
```

## Features

This module typically includes functions for:
- Claude model completions
- Message-based conversations
- Tool calling capabilities
- Custom model configurations

See the [Anthropic API documentation](https://docs.anthropic.com/) for details on the underlying API.
